title: AnimalSnap
description: Prototype PWA that facilitates the tracking and conservation of local wildlife by allowing users to snap pictures of animals with their recent location and status. Features a modern user interface, offline persistent storage, and access to native device APIs (Camera, Location)

title: Connecting scotland
description: A freelance project built for a Community Interest Group. Bespoke design enhanced with Advanced Custom Fields for flexibility and extensibility. Automatic caching, image processing and CDN utilisation for optimal page speeds.
